/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and trucks navigating their way through the city. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene contrast to the busy scene below. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a vibrant light. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
